page.title: 20 ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS.
page.content:
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
We would like to take this opportunity to thank all the children from both the the third years of Oaklands Juniors and Tatsfield first school. Special thanks to Mrs Leaves and Mrs Grover who helped to type in our information. We would like to thank Mrs Kirby,Mrs Miller, Mrs Wheeler,Mrs Wright and Miss Young, for helping us on our trips and visits and for helping us with our work. The teachers are also thanked for arrangeing and heping with the Domesday Survey. They include Mrs Cross,Mr Segarty and Mr Wier.
